markdownRemark.html:
[T]here's a crucial difference between learning from someone, and giving our power away to another person's formulæ. One comes from self-worth, the other comes from the sense of lack.

— Suzanne Eder, The Dark Side of Self Improvement

frontmatter.author: Suzanne Eder
frontmatter.title: [T]here's a crucial difference between learning from someone, and giving our power away to another person's formulæ.  One comes from self-worth, the other comes from the sense of lack.
